Description: the start date and time of the event
the end date and time of the event
the date and time of the reminders, and the method of delivery (email, SMS, or pop-up)
the recurrence pattern of the event (daily, weekly, monthly, yearly)
the category or categories that the event belongs to (personal, work, etc)
a flag indicating whether the event has been completed
the permissions of the user, such as edit, delete, and export events
the phone number of the user, if applicable
the format used to export event data (CSV, Excel, etc.).
the file containing events to be imported into the system
the format of the imported file (CSV, Excel, etc.)
